Caliptra HW RevID

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0xd4
Size:
0x4

Description

Caliptra HW revision ID that matches the official final release milestone SoC stepping ID is repopulated with the value in the fuse register on every warm reset
Caliptra Access: RO
SOC Access: RO

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:16] SOC_STEPPING_ID r 0x0 -
[15:0] CPTRA_GENERATION r 0x11 -

Field Descriptions

SOC_STEPPING_ID

Property Value
resetsignal ^.^.cptra_rst_b

CPTRA_GENERATION

Caliptra official release version. Bit field encoding is:
[15:8] Patch version
[ 7:4] Minor version
[ 3:0] Major version

Property Value
resetsignal ^.^.cptra_rst_b
